sentences.en: All through lunch he had carefully avoided the subject of the house.
sentences.cn: 整个午饭期间，他一直在小心翼翼地回避房子的话题。

sentences.en: Fill out the application carefully, and keep copies of it.
sentences.cn: 仔细填写申请表，并且保存副本。

sentences.en: Harry had carefully bought and wrapped presents for Mark to give them.
sentences.cn: 哈里精心购置了礼物又仔细包好，让马克交给他们。

sentences.en: He began to feed in the spaghetti, carefully separating the strands.
sentences.cn: 他开始放入意大利面，小心翼翼地将面一缕缕分开。

sentences.en: He folded the sheets up carefully.
He moved carefully over what remained of partition walls.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地跨过残余的隔墙。

sentences.en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
sentences.cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General.
sentences.cn: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

sentences.en: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
sentences.cn: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

sentences.en: Read these notes carefully and keep them for future reference.
sentences.cn: 仔细阅读这些注释并将其保留下来以备将来之用。

sentences.en: Roy swung his legs carefully off the couch and sat up.
sentences.cn: 罗伊小心地把腿挪下沙发，坐了起来。

sentences.en: She selected a low gear and started down the track carefully.
sentences.cn: 她选了低速挡小心翼翼地沿小径下行。

sentences.en: This whole plan has been most carefully mapped out.
sentences.cn: 整个方案的规划极为精细。

sentences.en: Use a small aperture and position the camera carefully.
sentences.cn: 用小光圈，仔细调整相机位置。

sentences.en: Watch them carefully as they finish cooking because they can burn easily.
sentences.cn: 就要做好时得小心看着，因为它们很容易烧糊。

words.tran_cn: 粗心的；无忧无虑的；淡漠的
有同情心的；表示或感到关怀或关心的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地
